     <section id="main">
      <div class="_1bjWP7av">
       <div class="_2BH3_yEP">
        <div class="_3FITtBIl">
         <h1 class="_1fE4Jd1B">
          Hire the
          <a href="/top-3-percent">
           Top 3%
          </a>
          of Freelance Talent
          <sup>
           ®
          </sup>
         </h1>
         <p class="_8WPiU7iG">
          Toptal is an exclusive network of the top freelance software developers, designers, finance experts, product managers, and project managers in the world. Top companies hire Toptal freelancers for their most important projects.
         </p>
         <div class="_3vKNZYdG _3RO_VtGq">
          <a class="_2Gqpr7uD _1qE3XAR2" href="/hire">
           Hire Top Talent
          </a>
         </div>
        </div>
        <div class="_1APXlwgQ">
         <div class="_1Fbnhnrc">
          <img alt="" role="presentation" src="https://bs-uploads.toptal.io/blackfish-uploads/components/image/content/file_file/file/537780/hero_section_big-7b3f7827f4d67d143832d0eb5136e48a.jpg"/>
          <a class="_3rff5s42" href="https://www.toptal.com/resume/vladimir-mitrovic" rel="noopener noreferrer" target="_blank">
           <div class="_1AjdASpM">
            <div aria-label="Country of origin - Serbia" class="_3wfN6-k0" style="left:55.68025600000001%;top:25.118573333333334%">
            </div>
           </div>
           <p class="_1Zk3Zf7O" data-id="hero-talent-name">
            Vladimir Mitrovic
           </p>
           <p class="_4j_1uNOQ OMB8iuiQ">
            C# Developer
           </p>
           <p class="_1rA_BsDb">
            Previously at
            <strong>
             Apple
            </strong>
           </p>
          </a>
         </div>
        </div>
       </div>
      </div>
      <div class="U5_JdGVY">
       <div class="KN3Bqp5f _1YibmBYc _3LOPUP7d _2_32njdU">

        </p>

    <section class="_2Ife8h_H _1YibmBYc _1_bvS4sL _3LOPUP7d _2_32njdU">
     <header>
      <h2 class="fRKMN8hO">
       Leverage World-Class Talent
      </h2>
     </header>
     <div class="LKtg-tu1">
      We are the largest, globally-distributed network of top business, design, and technology talent, ready to tackle your most important initiatives.
     </div>
     <div class="_3vXk2FdX" role="list">
      <div class="amXpIPzb" role="listitem" tabindex="0">
       <img alt="" class="lazyload _2LyVzW3p _14oAADwH" data-src="https://frontier-assets.toptal.com/591387664d76ee1ffde7736696c3c5cc.svg" src="data:image/png;base64,R0lGODlhAQABAAD/ACwAAAAAAQABAAACADs="/>
       <img alt="" class="lazyload _3i1IPYJr _14oAADwH" data-src="https://frontier-assets.toptal.com/82f653c7a93b12782bce85eec4a6db43.svg" src="data:image/png;base64,R0lGODlhAQABAAD/ACwAAAAAAQABAAACADs="/>
       <h3 class="_3Ac-CMfT">
        Developers
       </h3>
       <p class="_1iFCoLqi">
        Seasoned software engineers, coders, and architects with expertise across hundreds of technologies.
       </p>
       <a aria-label="View Developers" class="_2TjuxGDI" href="/developers" tabindex="0">
        View Developers
        <svg height="8" width="12" xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2000/svg">

       </a>
      </div>

   <div data-hid="home-2">
    <section class="_2rtHMimn _1zyXkxSm _1YibmBYc _1_bvS4sL _3LOPUP7d _2_32njdU">
     <div class="_2e98AqZT">
      <h2 class="_1DAwOP3R">
       Build Amazing Teams, On Demand
      </h2>
      <p class="_2-gkB2sO">
       Quickly assemble the teams you need, exactly when you need them.
      </p>
      <div class="_3ATUx1NL xK1Y6wFp nSXNjloy _2hTqIJvN bMWr3Lne VRzpBOaS" role="list">
       <div class="RqckegCL _26ebzZtt _1mgQSQLr _3jgwFSUz" role="listitem">
        <div class="_1oViSdzd">
         <img alt="" class="lazyload _3CHjsr09" data-src="https://bs-uploads.toptal.io/blackfish-uploads/components/benefit/content/image_file/image/560908/hire_quickly-73465c194a619e997036471389d47536.svg" src="data:image/png;base64,R0lGODlhAQABAAD/ACwAAAAAAQABAAACADs="/>
         <div>
          <h3 class="FSKMR27j">
           Hire Quickly
          </h3>
          <p class="RAYAIDuh">
           Hire in under 48 hours. Scale up or down, no strings attached. We offer flexible engagements from hourly to full-time.
          </p>
         </div>
        </div>
       </div>
       <div class="RqckegCL _26ebzZtt _1mgQSQLr _3jgwFSUz" role="listitem">
        <div class="_1oViSdzd">
         <img alt="" class="lazyload _3CHjsr09" data-src="https://bs-uploads.toptal.io/blackfish-uploads/components/benefit/content/image_file/image/560909/top_three_percent-84a3232607ab54008147fa66eb1bb115.svg" src="data:image/png;base64,R0lGODlhAQABAAD/ACwAAAAAAQABAAACADs="/>
         <div>
          <h3 class="FSKMR27j">
           The Top 3%
          </h3>
          <p class="RAYAIDuh">
           Every applicant to the Toptal network is rigorously tested and vetted. Our highly selective process leads to a 98% trial-to-hire success rate.
          </p>
         </div>
        </div>
       </div>
       <div class="RqckegCL _26ebzZtt _1mgQSQLr _3jgwFSUz" role="listitem">

         <img alt="" class="lazyload _3CHjsr09" data-src="https://bs-uploads.toptal.io/blackfish-uploads/components/benefit/content/image_file/image/560910/leading_the_future_of_work-7623b38e47167ebb0f2a42649d699e18.svg" src="data:image/png;base64,R0lGODlhAQABAAD/ACwAAAAAAQABAAACADs="/>

           Leading the Future of Work

           Our network is ready for tomorrow's business challenges by embracing advanced and specialized skills including blockchain and AI.

         </div>

   <div data-hid="home-8">
    <section class="_1YibmBYc _1_bvS4sL _3LOPUP7d _2_32njdU">
     <h2 class="_1eRZ5EeE">
      Meet Talent in Our Network
     </h2>
     <div class="YSQ5c5aR">
      <ul class="S65qEQwP" role="tablist">

           <div class="_25TfQgrH">
            <a aria-hidden="true" class="_2c9SYlj- _23yTT71X" data-id="talent-resume" href="https://www.toptal.com/resume/gabriel-courtemanche" tabindex="-1">
             Gabriel Courtemanche
            </a>
            <p class="_27Qy9QKP">
             JavaScript Developer
            </p>
            <p class="O2d2c2qD">
             Gabriel is a highly efficient and reliable professional who possesses a broad skill set for web application development. He's been working on a range of products and clients—from working on scalability problems in production engineering teams at Shopify and Autodesk to launching new applications for startups. Most of his work consists of leading technical teams, by creating an easy development environment, fixing technical debts, providing best practices code examples, and mentoring devs.
            </p>
            <div class="_1-5VpbwN">
             <span class="_3S6UbfDR">
              Previously at

             Justin Michela
            </a>
            <p class="_27Qy9QKP">
             Java Developer
            </p>
            <p class="O2d2c2qD">
             Justin is a technical professional with a passion for learning and 15+ years of experience leading teams to build enterprise-grade distributed applications that solve real-world problems. He is a firm believer that collaboration across all facets of a business, from development to marketing to sales, is required to succeed in this endeavor.
            </p>

           <div class="_25TfQgrH">
            <a aria-hidden="true" class="_2c9SYlj- _23yTT71X" data-id="talent-resume" href="https://www.toptal.com/resume/frederique-mittelstaedt" tabindex="-1">
             Frédérique Mittelstaedt
            </a>
            <p class="_27Qy9QKP">
             Python Developer
            </p>
            <p class="O2d2c2qD">
             Frédérique is a software engineer and entrepreneur with an MSc in theoretical physics from Imperial College London. He excels at building full-stack systems with the web, desktop, and mobile apps, microservices, and external integrations. Frédérique co-founded an international marketing agency and three startups in developer tools, cybersecurity, and AI. Frédérique regularly releases TypeScript packages and contributes to other open-source projects.
            </p>
            <div class="_1-5VpbwN">
             <span class="_3S6UbfDR">
              Previously at

           <div class="_25TfQgrH">
            <a aria-hidden="true" class="_2c9SYlj- _23yTT71X" data-id="talent-resume" href="https://www.toptal.com/designers/resume/osandi-sekou-robinson" tabindex="-1">
             Osandi Sekoú Robinson
            </a>
            <p class="_27Qy9QKP">
             Product Designer
            </p>
            <p class="O2d2c2qD">
             Mentored at Apple, Osandi has spent over ten years helping teams create human-centered products that delight customers. After a product role at Square, he led and directed a remote team of five engineers, built and grew a lifestyle brand, and cut his teeth as a designer in a founder role. As one of Toptal's elites, he's changed the way organizations solve problems for their users, as well as produced world-class interfaces across B2B/B2C markets. Osandi is currently innovating crypto fintech.
            </p>
            <div class="_1-5VpbwN">
             <span class="_3S6UbfDR">

           <div class="_25TfQgrH">
            <a aria-hidden="true" class="_2c9SYlj- _23yTT71X" data-id="talent-resume" href="https://www.toptal.com/designers/resume/adrien-valesa" tabindex="-1">
             Adrien Valesa
            </a>
            <p class="_27Qy9QKP">
             UX/UI Designer
            </p>
            <p class="O2d2c2qD">
             Adrien is a French UX designer with more than 13 years’ experience in design, user experience, interaction design, and visual identity across a broad range of industries. He's had the opportunity to work with big accounts such as LEGO Education and MIT. He applies user-centered methodologies to help internal and external teams write product requirements to deliver research insights, experience maps, information architecture, and wireframes.
            </p>
            <div class="_1-5VpbwN">

            <a aria-hidden="true" class="_2c9SYlj- _23yTT71X" data-id="talent-resume" href="https://www.toptal.com/designers/resume/jake-kahana" tabindex="-1">
             Jake Kahana
            </a>
            <p class="_27Qy9QKP">
             Visual Designer
            </p>
            <p class="O2d2c2qD">
             Jake is an award-winning designer who uses storytelling, art, and technology to instigate positive social change and build stronger businesses. He's worked with a range of Fortune500 companies, major nonprofits, government agencies, and startups. Over the last ten years, Jake's work has helped these companies change their public image, reach broader audiences, and impact more lives. He'd love to collaborate with you on your next big challenge.
            </p>

           <div class="_25TfQgrH">
            <a aria-hidden="true" class="_2c9SYlj- _23yTT71X" data-id="talent-resume" href="https://www.toptal.com/finance/resume/anuar-heberlein" tabindex="-1">
             Anuar Heberlein
            </a>
            <p class="_27Qy9QKP">
             M&amp;A Expert
            </p>
            <p class="O2d2c2qD">
             Anuar has participated in transactions across the Americas, totaling more than $7 billion over the past 12 years. He has extensive experience working with C-level executives and helping many Fortune 500 clients with corporate and growth strategy projects, M&amp;As, valuations, and JVs. Anuar holds an MBA from INSEAD and a BS in economics from ITAM.
            </p>

           <div class="_25TfQgrH">
            <a aria-hidden="true" class="_2c9SYlj- _23yTT71X" data-id="talent-resume" href="https://www.toptal.com/finance/resume/francesco-castellano" tabindex="-1">
             Francesco Castellano
            </a>
            <p class="_27Qy9QKP">
             Market Researcher
            </p>
            <p class="O2d2c2qD">
             Francesco has more than fifteen years of experience in research, finance, consulting, and business management. During this time, he has worked on 20+ projects as a consultant at Bain &amp; Company and launched Uber operations in Turin, Italy. Lately, he has founded Tondo, an organization focusing on the circular economy, and Novu, a company driving the implementation of clean and circular innovations. Francesco is passionate about innovation and entrepreneurship.
            </p>
            <div class="_1-5VpbwN">
             <span class="_3S6UbfDR">
              Previously at

           <div class="_25TfQgrH">
            <a aria-hidden="true" class="_2c9SYlj- _23yTT71X" data-id="talent-resume" href="https://www.toptal.com/finance/resume/neil-portus" tabindex="-1">
             Neil Portus | CFA, CMA
            </a>
            <p class="_27Qy9QKP">
             Interim CFO
            </p>
            <p class="O2d2c2qD">
             Neil is a CFO for growth companies and a former equity analyst at Goldman Sachs in NY where he helped lead numerous transactions including Zipcar's $1.1 billion IPO. He was also an equity analyst at Barclays Capital &amp; Lehman Brothers and began his career at a boutique investment bank (M&amp;A, restructuring, debt financings). He's built his operational skills both as a startup founder and as the CFO of an East Africa-focused impact investment firm.
            </p>
            <div class="_1-5VpbwN">
             <span class="_3S6UbfDR">
              Previously at
             </span>
             <img alt="Goldman Sachs" class="lazyload _3m0TTDhY" data-src="https://bs-uploads.toptal.io/blackfish-uploads/components/image/content/file_file/file/403451/previous_company_logo-fff7dd049575d0b6db4ea6f3ab146ced.svg" src="data:image/png;base64,R0lGODlhAQABAAD/ACwAAAAAAQABAAACADs="/>

       </div>

          <div class="_9qc3kKnu Una0M7xj _3alamt95">
           <a aria-hidden="true" class="_2c9SYlj- oYfE6Xrf" href="https://www.toptal.com/project-managers/resume/marco-de-stefano" tabindex="-1">
            <img alt="" class="lazyload _13TWm89r" data-happo-hide="true" data-src="https://bs-uploads.toptal.io/blackfish-uploads/components/image/content/file_file/file/157808/talent_tabs_section-1abbdc6a80905c1af9cd320fd43bd7b8.jpg" src="data:image/png;base64,R0lGODlhAQABAAD/ACwAAAAAAQABAAACADs=" width="100%"/>

           <div class="_25TfQgrH">
            <a aria-hidden="true" class="_2c9SYlj- _23yTT71X" data-id="talent-resume" href="https://www.toptal.com/project-managers/resume/marco-de-stefano" tabindex="-1">
             Marco De Stefano
            </a>
            <p class="_27Qy9QKP">
             Agile Project Manager
            </p>
            <p class="O2d2c2qD">
             Marco started out as a software developer but moved on to more suitable roles—scrum master and Agile project manager—which he’s been successfully occupying for over the past decade. His technical background and business-oriented mindset facilitate effective communication with development teams and with different business stakeholders. Recently in his latest projects, he also works as an Agile coach to foster scrum adoption.
            </p>
            <div class="_1-5VpbwN">

             Meko Kofahl
            </a>
            <p class="_27Qy9QKP">
             Mobile Project Manager
            </p>
            <p class="O2d2c2qD">
             Meko has been working with technology and software development since the early 1990s, initially in website development, then transitioning to managing general development delivery, system integration, project teams, and project portfolios. Her industry experience has included several telcos and technology start-ups. Most recently, she has begun coaching waterfall-to-Agile transformations and has helped several SMEs with their migration to Scrum.

Adan is an advocate for customer-centric design, UX, and the thoughtful application of technological innovations.

    <div data-hid="home-5">
     <div class="_1YibmBYc _11ZqUWmz _2_32njdU">
      <div class="_1YibmBYc _3DOEOvRI">
       <div class="xK1Y6wFp VRzpBOaS" role="list">
        <div class="_vWh44cV RqckegCL _1ArckmJZ _3jgwFSUz" role="listitem">
         <div class="_64wRZ6xh">
          <h2 class="_1r8wFQ13 GL1BsDfm">
           Why Organizations Choose Toptal
          </h2>
          <p class="_2Fa2w4cD">
           Discover the many ways in which our clients have embraced the benefits of the Toptal network.
          </p>
         </div>
        </div>
        <div class="RqckegCL _26ebzZtt _1ArckmJZ _3jgwFSUz" role="listitem">
         <div class="_2vQjp_O2 _1doXJJpm _2aYXDjr3 _1fycIOYl">
          <div class="_3-8TMpeS">

      <section class="_1YibmBYc _3LOPUP7d _2_32njdU">
       <h2 class="GL1BsDfm Her0Bht-">
        Hear From Our Clients
       </h2>
       <div class="_3wZgC01h" data-happo-hide="true">

   <div class="_1YibmBYc _3LOPUP7d">
    <section class="_1YibmBYc _3LOPUP7d _2_32njdU">
     <h2 class="_3t7loGZ8 GL1BsDfm">
      Explore Trending Toptal Publications
     </h2>
     <div class="rArfi2Y4" role="list">
      <div class="_2AOdQKTV _3avJuwHw _2JS0AOBT" coverimageurl="https://bs-uploads.toptal.io/blackfish-uploads/blog/article/content/cover_image_file/cover_image/511385/0115_Engineering-Building-RestAPI-Part-2-ModelsMiddlewareServices_Luke-Newsletter-5c0cb28c1db6ab8426adb6cc68fc3a88.png" data-id="blog-card" role="listitem" smallregularcoverimageurl="https://bs-uploads.toptal.io/blackfish-uploads/blog/article/content/cover_image_file/cover_image/511385/regular_300x120_0115_Engineering-Building-RestAPI-Part-2-ModelsMiddlewareServices_Luke-Newsletter-5c0cb28c1db6ab8426adb6cc68fc3a88.png" smallretinacoverimageurl="https://bs-uploads.toptal.io/blackfish-uploads/blog/article/content/cover_image_file/cover_image/511385/retina_300x120_0115_Engineering-Building-RestAPI-Part-2-ModelsMiddlewareServices_Luke-Newsletter-5c0cb28c1db6ab8426adb6cc68fc3a88.png">

         <source data-srcset="https://bs-uploads.toptal.io/blackfish-uploads/blog/article/content/cover_image_file/cover_image/511385/regular_800x320_0115_Engineering-Building-RestAPI-Part-2-ModelsMiddlewareServices_Luke-Newsletter-5c0cb28c1db6ab8426adb6cc68fc3a88.png 1x, https://bs-uploads.toptal.io/blackfish-uploads/blog/article/content/cover_image_file/cover_image/511385/retina_800x320_0115_Engineering-Building-RestAPI-Part-2-ModelsMiddlewareServices_Luke-Newsletter-5c0cb28c1db6ab8426adb6cc68fc3a88.png 2x" media="(min-width: 768px) and (max-width: 1023px)" srcset="data:image/png;base64,R0lGODlhAQABAAD/ACwAAAAAAQABAAACADs="/>
         <source data-srcset="https://bs-uploads.toptal.io/blackfish-uploads/blog/article/content/cover_image_file/cover_image/511385/regular_500x200_0115_Engineering-Building-RestAPI-Part-2-ModelsMiddlewareServices_Luke-Newsletter-5c0cb28c1db6ab8426adb6cc68fc3a88.png 1x, https://bs-uploads.toptal.io/blackfish-uploads/blog/article/content/cover_image_file/cover_image/511385/retina_500x200_0115_Engineering-Building-RestAPI-Part-2-ModelsMiddlewareServices_Luke-Newsletter-5c0cb28c1db6ab8426adb6cc68fc3a88.png 2x" media="(min-width: 1024px)" srcset="data:image/png;base64,R0lGODlhAQABAAD/ACwAAAAAAQABAAACADs="/>
         <img alt="" class="lazyload" data-src="https://bs-uploads.toptal.io/blackfish-uploads/blog/article/content/cover_image_file/cover_image/511385/retina_500x200_0115_Engineering-Building-RestAPI-Part-2-ModelsMiddlewareServices_Luke-Newsletter-5c0cb28c1db6ab8426adb6cc68fc3a88.png" height="100" src="data:image/png;base64,R0lGODlhAQABAAD/ACwAAAAAAQABAAACADs="/>
        </picture>
       </a>
       <div class="KxHj95DN">
        <div class="_3xeRr4HI">
         <img alt="" class="lazyload effect-opacity _1kyxjycq" data-src="https://bs-uploads.toptal.io/blackfish-uploads/talent/profile/picture_file/picture/535508/retina_60x60_huge_74803ec426b190bbe2f51c84d9fed0b4-a9c788f6102e5f3abf8f00b3ce367652.jpg" height="48" src="data:image/png;base64,R0lGODlhAQABAAD/ACwAAAAAAQABAAACADs=" width="48"/>
        </div>
        <div class="_27W_cjOv">
         <a class="_2c9SYlj- _31aQZWyI" href="https://www.toptal.com/developers/blog">
          Engineering
         </a>
         <a class="_2c9SYlj- _31aQZWyI" href="https://www.toptal.com/developers/blog/back-end">
          Back-end
         </a>
        </div>
        <h3 class="PnmEEQ_-">
         <a class="_35iK7zmm" href="https://www.toptal.com/express-js/nodejs-typescript-rest-api-pt-2">
          Building a Node.js/TypeScript REST API, Part 2: Models, Middleware, and Services
         </a>
        </h3>
        <div class="_1mjIKiS3">
         by
         <strong>
          Marcos Henrique da Silva
         </strong>
        </div>
        <p class="IpHlFM7w">
         The Express.js REST API journey continues! Move from models to full DAOs and DTOs, validate requests with middleware, separate services from controllers, and prepare for a real database.
        </p>
        <div class="_3XfNRYjc">
         <span>
          15
          <!-- -->
          minute read
         </span>
         <a class="IYgLf9Fx" href="https://www.toptal.com/express-js/nodejs-typescript-rest-api-pt-2">
          Continue Reading
         </a>
        </div>
       </div>
      </div>

        <h3 class="PnmEEQ_-">
         <a class="_35iK7zmm" href="https://www.toptal.com/gitflow/enhanced-git-flow-explained">
          Enhanced Git Flow Explained
         </a>
        </h3>
        <div class="_1mjIKiS3">
         by
         <strong>
          Daniel Ivanov
         </strong>
        </div>

         </a>
        </div>
        <h3 class="PnmEEQ_-">
         <a class="_35iK7zmm" href="https://www.toptal.com/webassembly/webassembly-rust-tutorial-web-audio">
          WebAssembly/Rust Tutorial: Pitch-perfect Audio Processing
         </a>
        </h3>
        <div class="_1mjIKiS3">
         by
         <strong>
          Peter Suggate
         </strong>
        </div>
       </div>
      </div>
     </div>
     <div class="_21PbwWbz">
      <a class="aqyl0q_p" href="/blog">
       Read More Thought Leadership
      </a>
     </div>
    </section>
   </div>
   <div class="_1YibmBYc _11ZqUWmz _2_32njdU">
